lpcfymasaapi.configs.mutableConfig.title: Add an option
lpctools.configs.title: LPCTools configs - %s
lpctools.configs.generic.title: Generic
lpctools.configs.generic.configOpenGui.c: The key open the in-game config GUI
lpctools.configs.generic.pauseOnConfigPa: Decide whether to pause the game in singlePlayer when LPCTools config page opened
lpctools.configs.generic.labelButtonDist: Sets the spacing between labels and buttons for all LPCTools configuration entries
lpctools.configs.generic.indentAll.name: Global Indent
lpctools.configs.generic.indentAll.comme:
Adds extra left-side indentation to all LPCTools configurations, effectively shifting elements to the right
Measured in screen pixels (affected by GUI scaling)
lpctools.configs.generic.indentSpaces.co:
Creates visual indentation by adding spaces before labels
Number of spaces = (Current configuration depth) × (this value)
lpctools.configs.generic.indentShift.com:
Indentation amount = (Current configuration depth) × (this value)
Measured in screen pixels (affected by GUI scaling)
Uses the cumulative width of all parent configuration labels as indentation
Recommended to combine with indentShift; Combining with indentSpaces will cause progressive indentation increase per level
lpctools.configs.scripts.hoverTextDispla: Press this key or set it to blank to display hovering text in the script editor interface
lpctools.configs.scripts.stretchSensitiv:
Controls the stretch sensitivity when using the mouse wheel to zoom in the editor interface
New zoom factor = Old zoom factor × exp(Value of this config × Signed mouse wheel delta)
lpctools.configs.generic.threadPool.name: Use Independent Thread Pool
lpctools.configs.generic.threadPool.comm:
Let LPCTools' multi-thread tool use an independent thread pool instead of default thread pool
Thus those tools may not stuck main processes
lpctools.configs.generic.threadPool.thre: Independent thread pool thread count. Maximum value is the thread count of your CPU.
lpctools.configs.generic.liquidPlacesAsC:
Full liquid block as can spawn if other detects passed
Useful for example detects whether drowned may spawn
lpctools.configs.generic.extraSpawnBlock:
Basic determinant is not always correct
Use these lists to tweak spawn-able determinant
lpctools.configs.generic.extraNoSpawnBlo:
Basic determinant is not always correct
Use these lists to tweak spawn-able determinant
lpctools.configs.generic.reachDistanceAl:
Always set Reach Distance config maximum value as Double.MAX_VALUE
§eWatch out! Some tools may iterate all the blocks in reach distance
§eAnd game may be not responding if reach distance was too big
lpctools.configs.generic.playClickSoundF: You can let LPCTools play ClickSound when config gui opened from ModMenu GUI if you like~
lpctools.configs.tools.title: Tools
lpctools.configs.tools.closeAll.comment: Disable all tools on one click
lpctools.configs.tools.closeAll.title: Disable All
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.name: Filling Assistant
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.comment: This tool helps you set blocks to fill holes automatically
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.testDistance.c:
A higher value allows the Fill Assistant
to search paths within a larger radius
This improves accuracy in detecting
whether block placement will block the original path
but may significantly impact performance with larger values
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.disableOnLeftD:
Disables Filling Assistant in game
when left mouse button down
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.disableOnGUIOp:
Disables Filling Assistant when GUI
(such as config screen, ESC screen or inventory screen)
opened
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.placeableItems: Items that can be placed as blocks by fillingAssistant
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.passableBlocks: Blocks that referred to as passage by fillingAssistant
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.transparentAsP:
Let the filling assistant
treat all transparent blocks
as passable when pathfinding
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.notOpaqueAsPas:
Let the filling assistant
treat all non-opaque blocks
as passable when pathfinding
§8Don't ask me if this is a duplicate of the one above
§8If you ask, it's because Mojang did something weird
§8isTransparent() and !isOpaque() are not necessarily equal
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.requiredBlocks:
Blocks that reserved when filling blocks
No blocks will be placed next to such block by Filling Assistant.
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.offhandFilling: Uses offhand to operate when enabled
lpctools.configs.tools.FA.limitRange.out:
Refer to outer range blocks
as unpassable, passable or origin
lpctools.configs.tools.LC.name: Liquid Cleaner
lpctools.configs.tools.LC.comment:
This tool helps you set blocks to clean liquid automatically
Needs a lot of water-undestroyable water-unloggable
non plant zero hardness blocks
lpctools.configs.tools.LC.disableOnGUIOp:
Disables Liquid Cleaner when GUI
(such as config screen, ESC screen or inventory screen)
opened
lpctools.configs.tools.LC.offhandFilling: Uses offhand to operate when enabled
lpctools.configs.tools.LC.cleaningBlocks: Blocks can be used by the tool
lpctools.configs.tools.LC.ignoreDownward:
Since water cannot flow upwards,
downward fluid checks can be safely omitted for optimization
lpctools.configs.tools.LC.limitRange.exp:
Expands the cleaning area by one block
Aims to completely remove all fluids and cleanup blocks within the defined area
When disabled in water-submerged scenarios,
the outermost layer of cleanup blocks will remain as water barriers
lpctools.configs.tools.SX.name: Slight X-Ray
lpctools.configs.tools.SX.comment:
This tool highlights ores exposed in air
or near blocks that has just been broken
lpctools.configs.tools.SX.defaultColorMe:
Define how to get the default color
By Default Color: by a specific color
By Texture Color: by treated texture average color(Or maybe particle color?)
Choose a color as the default color
Modifies the saturation from the texture color by an algorithm (hyperbolic tangent based actually)
Modifies the brightness from the texture color by an algorithm (hyperbolic tangent based actually)
lpctools.configs.tools.SX.XRayBlocks.blo: Choose a block to be highlighted
You can decide whether to customize specified color or use default color
lpctools.configs.tools.SX.useCullFace.co: Decide whether use Cull Face when rendering
lpctools.configs.tools.AG.name: Auto Grindstone
lpctools.configs.tools.AG.comment: This tool helps you erase useless enchantments
lpctools.configs.tools.AG.limitEnchantme:
Only enchantments in this list(and below its max level if level is set)
will be erased by this tool
lpctools.configs.tools.AS.name: Anti Spawner
lpctools.configs.tools.AS.comment: This tool helps you cover spawn-able blocks with selected block to disable mob spawning
lpctools.configs.tools.AS.placeableItems: Items can be placed by Anti Spawner
Maximum Reach Distance by Anti Spawner
lpctools.configs.tools.CS.name: Can Spawn Display
lpctools.configs.tools.CS.comment: This tool displays can spawn places
lpctools.configs.tools.CS.displayColor.c: Color used to render the display shapes
lpctools.configs.tools.CS.renderDistance: Render distance for this tool, based on block
lpctools.configs.tools.CS.renderMethod.c: Render method for this tool, decides the display shape
lpctools.configs.tools.CS.renderXRays.co: Whether display shapes through blocks (just like X-Ray)
lpctools.configs.tools.BR.name: Break Restriction
lpctools.configs.tools.BR.comment: You can use this tool to restrict your block breaking and prevent some unwanted block breaking
lpctools.configs.tools.BR.limitRange.com:
Restrict breaking range
Based on MiniHUD shapes and Litematica schematics or render range
so that you should install any of those mods to enable this config
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.offhandOperate: Decide whether use offhand to operate
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.name: Tiling tool
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.comment: This tool helps you tilling area based on selection area blocks.
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.refresh.title: refresh
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.refresh.name: Refresh
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.refresh.commen: Click button or press hotkey to refresh and restore tiling block and tiling area data
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.setByLitematic: Use current Litematica selection area to set corners' coordinate or something
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.litematicaButt:
Basic or extra Set by Litematica button operation
Corner only: only set the corners' coordinate when Litematica button operates
Corners And Buffer: set the corners' coordinate and refresh buffer
Buffer Directly: use litematica selection area coordinates to refresh buffer directly and do not set the coordinate config
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.autoRefresh.co:
Auto Refresh Opportunity(use config coordinates)
"On First Enable"refers to the first enable after game launching but in the world
lpctools.configs.tools.TT.vagueBlocks.co: Vague Blocks configuration. Blocks within the same list can be mixed and matched.
lpctools.configs.tools.FM.name: Furnace Maintainer
lpctools.configs.tools.FM.comment:
Helps you maintain your furnace group
Currently can only help you remove obstructions in the furnace
lpctools.configs.tools.MB.name: Moss Borer
lpctools.configs.tools.MB.comment: Digging holes fast using moss (not so easy to use yet)
lpctools.configs.tools.AR.name: Auto Reconnect
lpctools.configs.tools.AR.comment:
Reconnects the server automatically
Maybe some extra functions will be added in the future
lpctools.configs.tools.AR.firstAttemptDe: Attempt delay for the first attempt (i)
lpctools.configs.tools.AR.delayLinearFac:
Attempt Delay Linear Factor (l)
Reconnect delay after n time is (i + n * l) * pow(p, n) seconds
lpctools.configs.tools.AR.delayExpFactor:
Attempt Delay Exp Factor (p)
Reconnect delay after n time is (i + n * l) * pow(p, n) seconds
lpctools.configs.tools.AR.maxAttemptTime:
Reconnect max attempt times
Set to -1 to remove attempt times' limit
lpctools.configs.tools.EH.name: Entity Highlight
lpctools.configs.tweaks.title: Tweaks
lpctools.configs.tweaks.blockReplaceHotk: Define an extra hotkey used to replace blocks, which reacts the same as pressing both mouse buttons.
lpctools.configs.tweaks.happyGhastRiding: Use sneak/jump key to move up and down when riding happy ghast instead of player pitch when enabled
Define a hotkey to dismount the happy ghast when happyGhastRidingTweak enabled.
lpctools.configs.tweaks.barTweaks.name: Bar tweaks
lpctools.configs.tweaks.barTweaks.commen: Tweak the bar display above the quick bars
lpctools.configs.tweaks.barTweaks.expBar: Let experience bar displays locator points
lpctools.configs.tweaks.barTweaks.jumpBa: Let jump bar displays locator points
lpctools.configs.tweaks.barTweaks.locato: Let locator bar use experience bar's background
lpctools.configs.tweaks.barTweaks.creati: Let experience bar shows when creative
Let status bar shows when creative
lpctools.configs.tweaks.enchantmentLevel:
Vanilla shows enchantment level incorrectly when level > 10
Enable this to fix that

Set the maximum level to use Roman Numerals
Levels above this will use Arabic Numerals
lpctools.configs.tweaks.modMenuPlayClick: Let ModMenu play ClickSound when any of the config screen is opened from there
lpctools.configs.tweaks.lpcfyTweakerooLi: Make some of Tweakeroo lists use LPCTools style editable config
lpctools.configs.scripts.title: Scripts
lpctools.configs.scripts.guiScale.name: GuiScale
lpctools.configs.scripts.guiScale.commen:
Vanilla GuiScale config
You may like to change the Gui size while editing scripts
So I added this, just for convenience
Select visual representation during script item dragging:
• Vertical Drag: Element moves vertically while locked horizontally
• Free Drag: Dragged element follows mouse cursor precisely
• Direct: Element directly appears at target position (jump transition)
lpctools.configs.scripts.dragBoundaryCon: Restrict dragged item movement within list boundaries on Y-axis
lpctools.configs.scripts.moveHighlightCo: The extra rect color rendered on the background when holding and moving script edit screen
lpctools.configs.scripts.reservedDistanc: Reserved distance from script edit screen elements' actual boundary to screen's edge
Press this key or set this key as empty to show drag button in script edit screen
lpctools.configs.scripts.copyPastDisplay: Press this key or set this key as empty to show copy button and paste button in script edit screen
lpctools.configs.scripts.insertRemoveDis: Press this key or set this key as empty to show insert button and remove button in script edit screen
lpctools.configs.scripts.scripts.name: Scripts
Decide whether to enable a script
Exception button, press to clear exceptions
lpctools.configs.debugs.title: Debugs
lpctools.configs.debugs.renderDebugShape: Enable to render some debug shapes
lpctools.configs.debugs.displayClickSlot:
Display the arguments when
net.minecraft.client.network.ClientPlayerInteractionManager.clickSlot()
is called
lpctools.configs.debugs.keyActDebug.name: Key Act Debug
lpctools.configs.debugs.keyActDebug.comm: Call some debug methods after key pressed
Show LPCTools' multi-thread task execute time
lpctools.configs.debugs.getBlockStateHot: Display the client blockState when key pressed
Only show the info I(the author) am interested in
lpctools.configs.debugs.timeTest.name: Time test
lpctools.configs.debugs.timeTest.comment: Click the button to test some time function
lpctools.configs.debugs.timeTest.title: Click to refresh time
lpctools.configs.debugs.timeTest.gameTim: Time on millis from LPCTools' first initialization
lpctools.configs.utils.limitRange.name: limitWorkingRange
lpctools.configs.utils.limitRange.commen:
Limits working range based on MiniHUD shapes and Litematica schematics or render range
so that you should install any of those mods to enable this config
lpctools.configs.utils.limitRange.rangeN:
Only regions with specific naming prefixes will be processed.
Assuming this config is "R" for example, then valid prefix formats include:
"+R","-R","+~R","-~R"
Symbol semantics explained in "Region Operation Mode" below.
lpctools.configs.utils.limitRange.rangeL:
Treat Litematica's render range as a special region for calculation.
Processing priority: After all Litematica schematics, but before other MiniHUD regions.

Four operation modes for schematic render ranges:
"+": Add shape to allowed area (Union)
"-": Subtract shape from allowed area (Difference)
"+": Add area outside shape (Inverse Union)
"-": Keep only overlapping area (Intersection)
lpctools.configs.utils.reachDistance.com:
Client Reach distance for this tool
If ghost blocks or ghost items often appears,
you can try to decrease this value
lpctools.configs.utils.limitOperationSpe:
Limit the operation speed of the tool
Prevent being kicked out of some servers due to excessive packet sending

Maximum Operation Speed
Usually the maximum average operation times per tick
lpctools.script.editScreen.title: Edit Script
lpctools.script.trigger.name: Trigger
lpctools.script.trigger.comment:
You need some methods to trigger your script.
That can be some game events or your input, etc.
lpctools.script.trigger.hotkey.name: Hotkey
lpctools.script.trigger.hotkey.comment: Powered by Malilib Hotkey system - you can configure this just as how you do in malilib
Trigger this script on every client tick start
lpctools.script.trigger.clientTickEnd.co: Trigger this script on every client tick end
lpctools.script.operations.name: Operations
lpctools.script.exception.id.invalidChar: Id string cannot contain any of the following characters: \/*?"<>|
lpctools.script.exception.id.invalidEnd: Id String can't end with '.' or ' '
lpctools.script.exception.runtime.notIns: Script runtime exception: notInstanceOf (expected "%s" but given "%s")
lpctools.script.exception.runtime.illega: Script runtime exception: illegalControlFlow - uncaught break or continue in for-loop initialization or update flow
lpctools.script.exception.runtime.mathPr: Script runtime exception: mathProblem - divided by integer zero or something
lpctools.script.suppliers.random.fromArr: Get object from an array with given index
lpctools.script.suppliers.controlFlowIss: Run multiple script statements in order
Run 'If True' if condition is true and run 'If False' if condition is false
'for' style loop : for(Initialization(); Condition(); Update()) LoopBody();

Set a local variable's value, create it automatically if does not exist
Local variables are valid for current script running and would be reset to undefined for next run
Set the value at a certain index position of an array
Send a client message to the chat HUD or screen overlay
Perform attack once at current position with current direction
Perform itemUse once at current position with current direction
Attack the block once at given position with given direction

Interact the block once using given parameters
You'd better make 'pos' inside of 'blockPos', otherwise the server may not accept this operation
lpctools.script.suppliers.boolean.and.co: Do 'AND' operation with given boolean results
lpctools.script.suppliers.boolean.or.com: Do 'OR' operation with given boolean results
lpctools.script.suppliers.boolean.notNul: True if given object is not null and false if null
lpctools.script.suppliers.boolean.canBre: Check if the block at given position can be break instantly (can be break by 'Attack Block')
lpctools.script.suppliers.integer.consta: Constant integer value configured by you
lpctools.script.suppliers.integer.intege: Some useful math integer triFunction (Currently just modPow I guess?)
Convert an double value into integer
Get some integer result from a BlockPos data
Integer result from two BlockPoses' calculate result
lpctools.script.suppliers.integer.itemSt: Current screen handler item stack count
lpctools.script.suppliers.double.constan: Constant double value configured by you
lpctools.script.suppliers.double.doubleC: Some useful double constants such as pi, the natural base, Euler's constant, etc.
lpctools.script.suppliers.double.doubleF: Convert an integer value into double
Get some double result from a Vec3d data
Double result from two Vec3ds' calculate result
lpctools.script.suppliers.double.blockIn: Current client main player block interaction range
lpctools.script.suppliers.double.entityI: Current client main player entity interaction range
lpctools.script.suppliers.string.constan: Constant string value configured by you
lpctools.script.suppliers.iterable.itera: Wrap an array into an iterable
lpctools.script.suppliers.iterable.block: BlockPoses from a center in given distance and would be iterated from closest
lpctools.script.suppliers.blockPos.direc: Unit vector of the given direction
lpctools.script.suppliers.block.constant: Constant block type configured by you
lpctools.script.suppliers.block.blockInW: Block at given position in current client world, VoidAir if out of range or not in game
lpctools.script.suppliers.itemStack.slot: ItemStack of some main slots for an entity: armors, hands, saddle, etc.
lpctools.script.suppliers.itemStack.inve:
ItemStack for current client player inventory at the given index
Empty stack if out of range or not in game
lpctools.script.suppliers.itemStack.curr: Current screen handler slot stack at the given index
lpctools.script.suppliers.entity.vehicle: Vehicle of the given entity, null if doesn't have vehicle
lpctools.script.suppliers.playerEntity.m: Current client main player entity, null if not in game
lpctools.compact.missingLitematica: Can't use this method: missing Litematica
